p: Coping with the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic demands that we use every affordable measure and should probably involve mixed solutions adapted to each environment. The fast evolution of this crisis also requires that these measures be continuously monitored for effectiveness. Nevertheless, even when the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic has passed, it will be important to maintain the generated knowledge and resources to deal with similar pandemics in the future. The global, high interconnectivity of human societies makes them inevitable.
